sources.title: Man About Town (1939)
sources.description: Â Jack Benny, Dorothy Lamour, Edward Arnold

metadata.Plot: Producer Bob Temple, who's brought an American show to London, loves his star Diana, but she won't take him seriously as a lover. To show her, he picks up stranger Lady Arlington, whose financier husband neglects her. On a weekend at the Arlington country house, Bob is used by both Lady A. and her friend to make their husbands jealous; this works all too well, and Bob is in danger from both husbands.
metadata.Writer: Morrie Ryskind, Zion Myers, Allan Scott
metadata.Actors: Jack Benny, Dorothy Lamour, Edward Arnold
